00040 enum KDBBackendMethod {
00041     KDB_BE_OPEN=1,               
00042     KDB_BE_CLOSE=1<<1,           
00043     KDB_BE_STATKEY=1<<2,         
00044     KDB_BE_GETKEY=1<<3,          
00045     KDB_BE_SETKEY=1<<4,          
00046     KDB_BE_SETKEYS=1<<5,         
00047     KDB_BE_RENAME=1<<6,          
00048     KDB_BE_REMOVEKEY=1<<7,       
00049     KDB_BE_GETCHILD=1<<8,        
00050     KDB_BE_MONITORKEY=1<<9,      
00051     KDB_BE_MONITORKEYS=1<<10,    
00052     KDB_BE_END=0                 
00053 };
